short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds video search buttons to anime lists on MAL.
short.ru: Добавляет кнопки поиска видео в списки аниме на MAL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By default, the extension will use crunchyroll.com. To add other sites, you have to take the following steps:
    - Go to your favorite anime-hosting website
    - Use search function
    - Copy a URL of the search results page, excluding your search query
    - Paste the URL to the 'New search URL' field in the extension's options and click the 'Add' button
    - You're good to go! Finding out how other functions are working should be easy enough.

Example:
    - Search for 'Gintama' on crunchyroll.com
    - The results page URL will be https://www.crunchyroll.com/search?q=gintama
    - Paste https://www.crunchyroll.com/search?q= to the 'New search URL' field in the extension's options and click the 'Add' button.
